is used to load the value of a free variable. (-> [[IntermediateLanguage]])

h1. format

<pre><code>["refer-free", <variable_pos>, <opecodes_next>]</code></pre>

h1. example

program:
<pre><code>(let ((a "a")(b "b"))
  (let ()
    a)</code></pre>

compiled:
<pre><code>[frame
   [constant "a"
   [argument
   [constant "b"
   [argument
   [constant 2
   [argument
   [close 0
      [constant 0
      [argument
      [refer-local 1
      [argument
      [close 1
         [refer-free 0
         [return]]
         [shift 0
         [apply]]
      -1]]]]]
      [apply]
   -1]]]]]]]
halt]</code></pre>
